author: admin
title: Liquidity Services Receives Recognition for IT Sustainability Efforts
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/14/2015 @ 11:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Liquidity Services 
WASHINGTON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Liquidity Services (NASDAQ: LQDT), a global solution provider in the reverse supply chain with the world’s largest marketplace for business surplus, announced today that one of its online marketplaces, Government Liquidation, recently received recognition from Sims Recycling Solutions for its efforts to responsibly dispose of more than 460,000 units of IT and electronic equipment. The company was selected to receive this honor based on the high volume of assets disposed, as well as its overall commitment to sustainability. 
“We are pleased to again receive this honor from Sims Recycling Solutions,” said Bruce Gearey, Executive Vice President of Global Operations for Liquidity Services’ Capital Assets Group. “Since we began our partnership with Sims more than a decade ago, we have worked with clients in multiple industries to develop and implement comprehensive end-of-life IT and electronic asset management programs that ensure maximum recovery value, compliance with environmental and data privacy laws, and support for corporate-level sustainability initiatives.” 
“One of the challenges companies face today is having full confidence in an IT disposal vendor to securely and responsibly destroy confidential data and equipment,” stated Steve Skurnac, President of Sims Recycling Solutions. “As a leading global provider of IT disposal services, we are proud that the strength of our data security and end-of-life management service offerings allows us to work with some of the largest Fortune 100 companies in the world.” 
About Liquidity Services 
Liquidity Services is a global solution provider in the reverse supply chain with the world’s largest marketplace for business surplus. We partner with global Fortune 1000 corporations, middle market companies, and government agencies to intelligently transform surplus assets and inventory from a burden into a liquid opportunity that fuels the achievement of strategic goals. Our superior service, unmatched scale, and ability to deliver results enable us to forge trusted, long-term relationships with over 8,000 clients worldwide. With nearly $6 billion in completed transactions, and approximately 3 million buyers in almost 200 countries and territories, we are the proven leader in delivering smart surplus solutions. Let us build a better future for your surplus. Visit us at LiquidityServices.com . 
About Sims Recycling Solutions 
Sims Recycling Solutions ( www.SimsRecycling.com ) is the global leader in electronics reuse and recycling. We have over 20 years’ experience in comprehensive IT asset disposition and mobile device refurbishment services either directly or through acquired businesses. Sims provides disposition services for all types of retired electronic equipment to local, national and global customers in every business sector including data centers, healthcare, financial service and technical organizations.
